posts.title: Forever Alone
posts.body: Today, my sad ass got walked in on by a relative while I was having an imaginary conversation, with an imaginary friend, and I was talking out loud.
posts.author: grangerrr

posts.title: Life is Pain
posts.body: Today, since my family and friends always make fun of me for being a wuss when it comes to pain, when I stubbed my toe, I made a point to not scream or complain in any way. Instead, I vomited and fainted.
posts.author: secretdragon818

posts.title: Gas Giant
posts.body: Today, I learned that the average human farts 15 times a day. I fart more than that within the first hour of the day, and thats even after not eating anything for three days.
posts.author: blogman77

posts.title: Off the clock, off the record
posts.body: Today, I was talking to a worker in Asda when an alarm went off on her watch and she took her vest off. Apparently, the alarm was the end of her shift, and removing the vest was so she could call me "a time-wasting tit" in a manner so I couldn’t report to her boss, since she was now on her own time.
posts.author: Crazycatlady532

posts.title: Rejection Hotline
posts.body: Today, after having my car's oil changed, I asked the girl at the front desk for her number and she gave it to me, so I was excited all day. That night I texted her and she asked who it was and I told her my name, then she told me she gave her number out to a lot of customers, so she didn’t remember me.
posts.author: dragonlord__Xx
